channel.title: Queries stuck in RQ status view
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
We have an issue with queries getting stuck in the RQ status view looking like they have been running for several months even though they are not running in the database and they do not seem to occupy any workers. Any ideas of how to solve this issue and get rid of them in the RQ Status view?
![Screenshot from 2022-10-12 10-10-16|690x238](upload://jhJwMRnPRxGaojk1QOE7I2daI8e.png)
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 10.1.0.b50633 * Browser/OS: Linux * How did you install Redash: Docker
We are running Redash self-hosted on an AWS ECS cluster with a Redis on an ElastiCache cluster.

Issue Summary

We have an issue with queries getting stuck in the RQ status view looking like they have been running for several months even though they are not running in the database and they do not seem to occupy any workers. Any ideas of how to solve this issue and get rid of them in the RQ Status view?
